## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem This Solves
Describe the problem or need this feature would address.
Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution
A clear and concise description of how you think this should work.

## User Story
As a [type of user], I want [goal] so that [reason].

Example: "As a foster care provider, I want to set medication reminders so that I don't forget to administer medications on time."

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case / Real-World Scenario
Describe a specific scenario where this feature would be useful:

Example:
> "When managing 5 children with different medication schedules, I need to see all upcoming doses for today in one view so I can plan my day efficiently."

## Alignment with Project Goals
How does this feature help foster care providers track medication administration?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.

- [ ] I would be willing to help implement this feature
